item.title: Natural Language Processing - Text Pre-processing
item.description: In this article, we are going to look at general steps of text pre-processing. Text Pre-processing Tokenisation Word-Based Tokenisation Tokenisation is the first step of text pre-processing, it is to split a bunch of text into a list of tokens. As an example, we could split “a cat on a pat” to [“a”, “cat”, “on
